biotools.summary: An analysis pipeline for mapping mutations using RNA-seq. It works without parental strain information, without the requirement of a pre-existing snp map of the organism, and without erroneous assumptions that recombination occurs at the same frequency across the genome.

bioschemas.name: MMAPPR
bioschemas.summary: An analysis pipeline for mapping mutations using RNA-seq. It works without parental strain information, without the requirement of a pre-existing snp map of the organism, and without erroneous assumptions that recombination occurs at the same frequency across the genome.
